query1: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Department is "cpsc"; show Department and ID; sort in ascending order by ID.
query2: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Average is greater than 94; show Average; sort in ascending order by Average.
query3: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Average is greater than 95 and Department is "adhe"; show Average and Department; sort in ascending order by Average.
query4: In rooms dataset rooms, find entries whose Short Name is "ALRD"; show Address.
query5: In courses dataset courses grouped by Average and Department, find entries whose Year is equal to 2018 and Average is greater than 97; show Average, Department, Year and avgGrade, where avgGrade is the AVG of Average; sort in ascending order by Department.
query6: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Pass is greater than 5; show Average, Pass and UUID; sort in ascending order by Pass.
query7: In courses dataset courses grouped by Instructor, Pass, Title and Year, find entries whose Instructor is "smulders, dave"; show Year and passingTotal, where passingTotal is the COUNT of Pass; sort in ascending order by Year.
query8: In rooms dataset rooms, find all entries; show Full Name and Address; sort in ascending order by Full Name.
query9: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Audit is not equal to 5 and Department is not "adhe"; show Audit and UUID; sort in ascending order by UUID.
query10: In courses dataset courses grouped by Average and Department, find entries whose Audit is greater than 5; show Average, Department, passCount and avgGrade, where passCount is the COUNT of Pass and avgGrade is the AVG of Average; sort in descending order by avgGrade.
